description: The sun sets, you lace up and dig your poles into the snow, the sound of clean, efficient movement echoing in your ears. This lightweight, windproof soft shell fabric is the ideal outer layer for unpredictable elements and comes with laser cut rear venting to allow hot air an escape as the pace picks up. Large zippered hand pockets add to its versatile design. The perfect jacket for cold cross-country laps.
name: Langnes Jacket - Mens
